# Common Transition Types

**API Collection**

These constants specify the transition types that can be used with the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATransition/type] property.

## Constants

- **fade**: The layer’s content fades as it becomes visible or hidden.
- **moveIn**: The layer’s content slides into place over any existing content.
- **push**: The layer’s content pushes any existing content as it slides into place.
- **reveal**: The layer’s content is revealed gradually in the direction specified by the transition subtype.

## Constants

- **Common Transition Subtypes**: These constants specify the direction of motion-based transitions. They are used with the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATransition/subtype] property.
